attributes.action: For Wales to have equal representation on the Union Flag the same as Sco/NI/Eng
attributes.additional_details:
So, as the Union Flag/Jack 🇬🇧 is the official flag of the United Kingdom I find it only fair & just that the 4 home Unions should have equal representation. Wales alleged representation comes under the St George’s cross of England after the invasion of Wales in 1282.
So should Wales have the mighty Dragon of the Welsh flag embedded on the front of the Union Jack or the cross of St David as with the 3 home unions ? Please sign comment & share with the world Cymru am Byth 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿
attributes.background: 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿Our proud & beautiful country of Wales still has no representation on the Union Flag🇬🇧due to the invasion of Wales by England in 1282, England’s St George’s cross Scotland’s Saltire & N/Ireland’s Ulster banner are the make up so 3 of the 4 Home Nations are represented but not Wales!!
